person.persName: Amelia H. Clay (Henderson County, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, resident. Virginia native. Married to Charles V. Clay. Resident of Henderson County, Kentucky, in 1860. Mother of Mary Ann Clay Dixon, Isabella P. Clay Dixon, and Henrietta P. Clay Ball. Resident of Henderson County, Kentucky, in 1840. Household owned nine enslaved persons in Henderson County in 1840. Resident of Henderson County in 1850. Owned two enslaved persons in Henderson County in 1850. Household owned an additional five enslaved persons in Henderson County in 1850. Resident of Henderson County in 1860. Household owned eight enslaved persons in Henderson County in 1860. Household owned eight enslaved persons in Henderson County in 1860. Owned Tom [Unknown] in Henderson County in December 1860.
